committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic and International Monetary Policy

official_title: To require the Secretary of the Treasury to mint coins in commemoration of the fiftieth anniversary of the Korean War to honor the United States Marine Corps participation.
short_title: United States Marine Corps Commemorative Korean War Coin Act

summary.text: United States Marine Corps Commemorative Korean War Coin Act - Provides for the minting of ten-dollar gold coins and one-dollar silver coins emblematic of the Marine Corps landing at Inchon during the Korean War. Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to issue such coins beginning January 1, 2001.

titles.title: United States Marine Corps Commemorative Korean War Coin Act
To require the Secretary of the Treasury to mint coins in commemoration of the fiftieth anniversary of the Korean War to honor the United States Marine Corps participation.
